    • Method Detail

      • getLowerBoundOfSingleTypeParameter

        public static Type getLowerBoundOfSingleTypeParameter(Type type)
        Resolves the Type of the lower bound of a single type argument of a ParameterizedType. 

           private List<MyModel> myModel -> MyModel.
   private Optional<MyModel> myModel -> MyModel.
        Parameters:
        type - must not be null.
        Returns:
        never null.

      • instantiateCollectionType

        public static <K,T extends Collection<K>> Collection<K> instantiateCollectionType(Class<T> collectionType,
                                                                  int length)
        Provides an implementation instance for the desired collection type. Example: If the collection type is List, a suitable list implementation is instantiated.
        Parameters:
        collectionType - must not be null.
        Returns:
        never null. Throws an IllegalStateException if the collection type is not supported.

      • isInstantiableCollectionType

        public static boolean isInstantiableCollectionType(Class<?> type)
        Parameters:
        type - must not be null.
        Returns:
        whether the given collection type can be instantiated using instantiateCollectionType(Class).

      • getInstantiableCollectionTypes

        public static Class<?>[] getInstantiableCollectionTypes()
        Returns:
        an array of the types a collection type must be assignable from in order to be instantiable.

      • instantiateCollectionType

        public static <K,T extends Collection<K>> Collection<K> instantiateCollectionType(Class<T> collectionType)
        Creates an instance with a default capacity.
        See Also:
        instantiateCollectionType(Class, int)
